long_description: With fine mesh netting and lightweight parachute nylon, the Byer Moskito Kakoon Hammock creates a comfortable, relaxing sanctuary away from bugs that you can take backpacking and car camping. The lightest, strongest and most durable Byer design so far, the Moskito Kakoon Hammock supports up to 250 lbs. Kakoon Hammock is reversible so it can be flipped over and used without the mosquito netting. Includes composite spreaders and a single guyline to support the mesh netting. 2 large double zippers offer easy entry. Storage pockets.
short_description: With fine mesh netting and lightweight parachute nylon, the Byer Moskito Kakoon Hammock creates a comfortable, relaxing sanctuary away from bugs that you can take backpacking and car camping.
